Name: Pop-It! Or Don't..
About the game: Pop-It! Or Don't.. is a casual, score-chasing physics game that rewards quick reflexes. Using your mouse, pop balloons until the round timer reaches zero. Every time you pop a balloon it spawns more. The faster you click the more bonus points you score, but as the round timer ticks down the balloons begin to fall faster and faster. Test your clicking skills!
